appDesc.message: You can aggregate separate tabs, remove duplicate tabs, and sort tabs by URL or page title by using OhMyTab.

option_top.message: Select the behaviors of the extension

option6.message: Show tab count on the icon

option7.message: Close search engine result tabs (Google, Bing, Baidu, Yahoo Japan)

option8.message: Work only for a current window

option9.message: Add "Close tabs in the same domain" to the context menu

text1.message: *1: "Merge tabs into one window" and "Work only for a current window" are exclusive

text2.message: Close tabs in the same domain
